name: WHIP AND BOOT
description:
by tain and HorseGuy

Break out your fedora and bullwhip! A tomb full of dangerous traps, gaps, and fascists awaits. Descend deep into this first-person action-adventure for a cracking good time as you quest to return the lost artifact to its rightful resting place. If anyone gets in the way, give them a mighty boot.

Controls:

LMB/Right Trigger: Whip

RMB/Left Trigger: Boot

WASD/Left Stick: Move

Space/A: Jump

CTRL: Crouch (hold)

C/Xbox B: Crouch (toggle)
